tool_description: Searches academic databases and repositories for relevant sources based on keywords, topics, and filters, returning structured metadata for each found source.

search_query.description: Primary search terms or research question

databases.description: Specific databases to search (e.g., PubMed, IEEE, JSTOR)

source_types.description: Types of sources to include (journal, conference, book, thesis)

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)

error_messages: Invalid search query: Search query cannot be empty or contain only special characters.
Unsupported database: Use supported databases like google_scholar, pubmed, arxiv, ieee, jstor.
Invalid year range: Publication years must be valid years with start_year <= end_year.
Invalid source type: Use supported types: journal, conference, book, thesis.
Results limit exceeded: max_results must be between 1 and 100.
usage: Provide a search_query with relevant keywords or research questions. Optionally specify databases, publication_years range, source_types, and max_results to refine the search.
